conversation.message:
We understand that logistics and operational flexibility are paramount for busy families, Parent_E, and we are happy to provide clarity on these essential matters.

Regarding late pickups, our standard day ends at 5:30 PM. We have a grace period until 5:45 PM. Should an unexpected delay occur, we ask parents to notify us immediately. If pickup occurs after 5:45 PM, a small, predetermined late fee is applied to cover the costs of staffing beyond scheduled hours. This policy is clearly communicated in our enrollment agreement.

For emergency contact procedures, we maintain a robust system. Upon enrollment, you provide primary and secondary emergency contacts (who are authorized for pickup). In the event of an emergency, we first contact the primary guardian, then the secondary, and simultaneously follow necessary medical protocols. All staff are trained in first aid and CPR, and we use a secure digital platform to ensure all contact information is instantaneously accessible and up-to-date.

We strive to be flexible and supportive partners to our families. We are confident our operational procedures meet the highest standards, and we sincerely hope this information helps you finalize your decision to join our community. We are ready to process your application when you are ready!
